title: july 23: a solar superstorm and earth's near miss
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the solar superstorm that nearly missed Earth in 2012. After, Maia recounts a bizarre occurrence at a Kings of Leon show in 2010. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
